data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Escobedo-Galván, Armando H., Velasco, Julián A., González-Maya, José F., Resetar, Alan (2015): Morphometric analysis of the Rio Apaporis Caiman (Reptilia, Crocodylia, Alligatoridae). Zootaxa 4059 (3): 541-554, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.3.6
